pagesJson.leading: Are you writing documentation? You are awesome! This guide is for you. It covers editing functionality and options in Strapi content management system.
pagesJson.title: Guidance For Editors

content.title: Get Started with Strapi
content.leading: This documentation site is powered by Strapi. It is a content management system (a.k.a. CMS). All the content, images and illustrations you see on this site come from the CMS.
